name: Time To Move
description:
In this game you are helping humans move from planet to planet because we keep destroying the planets we live on. To help them move, you must use the gravity of polluted planets and other things  to slingshot the escape pod to their next destination.

Controls:

A: Spawn planet

D: Spawn vortex

W/S: Increase and decrease planet size before placing

Left Click: Spawn object

Right Click: Remove Object

Click on the green check to go to the next level!
